item.title: NFS Server: A Complete Guide to Setting Up and Configuring
item.description: Are you looking for a way to share files between multiple machines in a network? NFS (Network File System) may be just what you need! In this guide, we’ll walk you through the process of setting up and configuring an NFS server on Linux. Step 1: Install the Required Packages The first step is to install the required packages on your server. You can do this by running the following command:
